useCase.name: Manage Account Notes
useCase.description: User can view account details and add notes related to the account.

preconditions.precondition: User is authenticated and has account access.

successEndConditions.condition: User successfully adds a note to the account through the system.

useCase.trigger: User clicks the button to add account note.

mainSequence.step: User clicks the 'Add account note' button in the account view header.
The system navigates to the page where User can add notes on the account.
User inputs the necessary data in the notes.
User clicks the 'Save Note' button to create and save the note.
The system creates the note as per the input data.
The note is stored in the Fines Database.
